data.text: @ReutersLegal @ElieNYC Here's what happens to these 35 guys -- they're given whatever the Special Forces version of desk duty is for the duration. Unless SCOTUS wants to start ruling on personnel assignments...
@ReutersLegal Gee, maybe they should tell him next what to do with Putin.  Who needs a POTUS when we have them?
@ReutersLegal It's only a set back if the Biden Administration unwisely accepts it. The judiciary has no role *whatever* in telling the Pentagon who is deployed and where.

@ReutersLegal This is weakening our military units specifically against the #1 public health threat in the world.

These are the actions of saboteurs in a time of global armed conflict against a declared adversary.
@ReutersLegal Or, “activist conservative court overreaches to hurt Biden”
@ReutersLegal This is y The Courts Need to be Expanded & Term limited
@ReutersLegal Maybe they shouldn’t be in the SOF community.
@ReutersLegal Court rules we must infect our allies. What is their position on venereal disease? They have it, I presume?
